summary: Senior IT Executive with extensive experience leading enterprise technology, governance, and infrastructure operations across highly regulated, multi-site environments. Proven capability in aligning IT strategy with institutional objectives, maintaining rigorous regulatory compliance, and driving digital enablement. Specialized in enterprise platforms, including Microsoft Dynamics Business Central, and managing multimillion-shilling IT budgets with focused cost optimization. Recognized for establishing resilient disaster recovery frameworks, institutional risk management protocols, and building cross-functional teams to deliver secure, scalable services. Committed to continuous improvement, operational excellence, and data protection in complex enterprise and healthcare training operations.

achievements.text: Lead enterprise IT strategy and operational governance across 15 business centers supporting over 1,000 corporate users.
Establish comprehensive IT policies and governance frameworks aligned with institutional growth and risk mitigation goals.
Drive operational compliance with ISO 27001 standards, codifying robust data protection and acceptable use protocols.
Oversee core enterprise platforms including centralized identity governance, Microsoft 365, and financial systems.
Direct Microsoft Dynamics Business Central operations, ensuring system reliability, user access controls, and data integrity.
Develop and test comprehensive disaster recovery and business continuity plans to guarantee uninterrupted service delivery.
Advise executive leadership regularly on infrastructure investments, cybersecurity posture, and emerging institutional risks.
Manage multi-site IT capital and operational budgets, executing cost optimization through rigorous vendor contract negotiation.
Implement ITIL-aligned service standards, structurally reducing average incident resolution times across regional centers.
Directed regional IT deployments across 500+ complex infrastructure sites, ensuring vendor compliance and project execution.
Administered multi-million-shilling infrastructure deployment budgets with strict cost controls and financial transparency to the board.
Negotiated demanding supply and service level agreements with tier-1 global OEMs, including Huawei, Cisco, and Ericsson.
Standardized multi-site operational compliance frameworks mapping to recognized ISO quality and occupational safety guidelines.
Led technical teams to execute physical infrastructure deployments and mitigate ongoing regional operational risks.
Supported enterprise-wide ISO 27001-aligned Information Security Management System (ISMS) initiatives to harden protected networks.
Maintained secure digital records governance, building auditable access continuity for a repository of 50,000+ regulatory filings.
Managed frontline access control administration and executed systemic access recertification reviews across institutional domains.
Supported core infrastructure operations safely operating within restricted aviation governance operational facilities.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Science in Telecommunication & Information Technology
